蚼字的基本解释

蚼
gǒu
〔蚼犬〕古书上说的一种食人的兽。

蚼
qú
〔玄蚼〕大蚂蚁。

蚼
xù
古同“??”。

蚼字的汉语字典释义

[①]［qú］
［《廣韻》其俱切，平虞，羣。］
［《廣韻》呼后切，上厚，曉。］
(1)见“蚼蛆”。
(2)见“蚼蟓”。
[②]［gǒu］
［《集韻》舉后切，上厚，見。］
神话中的兽名。

蚼字的康熙字典解释

【申集中】【虫字部】　蚼； 康熙笔画：11； 页码：页1079第30
【集韻】舉后切，音苟。【說文】北方有蚼犬，食人。　又恭于切，音拘。蚼蛘，蚍蜉也。【博雅】蚍蜉，齊、魯之閒謂之蚼蟓，梁、益之閒謂之元蚼。【郭註】音駒。　又權于切，音劬。原蠶，其蛹蝰蚼。　又【唐韻】呼后切，音吼。義與蚍蜉同。　或作?。

蚼字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体韩国明朝体
蚼字的起名意思

暂无。

Worm

[Xuanchi] Big ant.
Worm

Gu Tong "??".
Worm
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［qú］
["Guangyun" all cut, Pingyu, group. ]
["Guangyun" cut after the call, thick, Xiao. ]
(1) See "Maggot".
(2) See "蚼蟓".
[②]［gǒu］
["Jiyun" cut after lifting, thick, see. ]
The animal name in the myth.
Worm
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
[Shenzhen Collection] [Insect Character Department] 　蚼; Kangxi Strokes: 11; Page Number: Page 1079 30
【Ji Yun】Cut after lifting, sound gou. [Said the text] There are worm dogs in the north, cannibalism.　Respectful to cut again, sound restrained. The worm, the mayfly. 【Bo Ya】Chen 豉, Qi and Lu Zhixian are called 蚼蟓, Liang and Yi Zhixian are called Yuan 蚼. [Guo Note] Yinju.　You have the right to cut again, the sound 劬. The original silkworm, its chrysalis.　[Tang Yun] After the call, cut back, and shout. Righteousness is the same as Chi Fu.　Or make?.
Worm
